scripts.build: node -e "if (require('fs').existsSync('./scripts/validate-json.js')) { require('./scripts/validate-json.js') } else { console.log('JSON validation skipped - script not found') }" && next build
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run validate:json
scripts.prepare: node -e "if (process.env.NODE_ENV !== 'production' && !process.env.VERCEL && !process.env.CI) { try { require('husky').install() } catch (e) { console.log('Husky setup skipped in production/CI environment') } }"
